entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:50 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 64 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to ice pellets or snow near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over the isthmus. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
